titlestmt.titleproper: David Rockefeller papers, Photographic Collection, Personal, Professional and Travel
David Rockefeller papers, Photographic Collection, Personal, Professional and Travel FA1862

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2025-01-01 05:03:24 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: David Rockefeller papers, Photographic Collection, Personal, Professional and Travel

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Original order, as received. Primarily chronological.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of photographic prints, slides, contact sheets and snapshots, with select negatives.
